column5: Do the clocks go back tonight or Sunday night thanks!! (Confused)  And stay safe Monday. They say.... after clocks go back 1 hr it messes up peoples driving. The next day.  Thanks dsn
tonight before you go to bed..
So this means I can knock on the door at 9am?
Thanks Irish Get to sleep in.   dsn
I just set my clocks back.  I'm good for the morning
why didn't you just Google this?
Same could be said for a lot of your questions Pat.. he asked here.. because.. well.. it's just easier! lol
Because it also can be a reminder to others.  dsn
I think when the clocks jump forward in the spring, and people lose an hour, is the more dangerous time on the road.
but I googled, "I want the forum with the smartest people on it" and this is were it sent me, so where else would we ask questions
You're definately right! See I got everything all mess up.  See what no fishing does to me? Let alone, not just getting out to enjoy nature.      dsn
